title: Client machine broke
body: Using a mac and client updated to 7.16 when it finished downloading it didn't open. I tried clicking it again but still would not open. I've had this problem before and it usually starts working by itself later on but this time I'm not sure. I'm using a pretty old Mac version and I heard that it would stop being supported but didn't read about it in the patch notes. Plz, help.

replies.body: Same issues i downloaded a 60mb update this morning, played 1 game logged off and when i tried to get back on about 3 hours later i couldnt ive tried everything
I also reinstalled 2 times, used the hextech repair tool too and it says everything is ok. The client now also has the old logo for some reason. Bye Bye LoL

I'm having this problem too :( very upset. Leauge just won't open. I tried to reinstall but when I got to the "The Client Update has Begun," page nothing happens when I click launch. 
I'm using Mac OS X 10.7.5.
I'm just super upset about this because URFFFFF
don't do this to me riot I wanna play urf :(
I ended up buying a new computer, i have a partition that boots a newer version of the OSX and it works fine. I assume the old 7.16 software has finally met its maker

Same here!
I placed a ticket and after a lot of tests and replies they told me this:

"It seems that you are using MacOSX Version 10.7.5. League of Legends doesn't support this version anymore so you will have to update to a newer version."

The thing is it can't be updated due to the age of my mac (2011). Or is that some way to do it?
Yeah, my mac is that same age so that explains it. I think you can still update it

Hmmmm it almost sounds like your Mac doesn't quite have all of the correct admin settings for League to properly run anymore. Let's double check those [**administrator settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), and let me know if it starts working again or not!
soooooo should I just turn in a ticket?
also the more I leave the client alone the closer it gets to opening I think. When i press the icon nothing happens but if i wait a bit the icon starts bouncing until it closes again
I did but it still doesn't open. THe client was working right before the patch so i don't think anything would have changed in the settings :l
I would try re-downloading league but don't trust my old mac enough. It took about a day last time. I know Riot will eventually stop supporting it but was still hoping to play urf :l
I also have not be able to open the client after patch.  Like mentioned in other comments this has happened before and I usually can get it worked out after some fiddling
But what kind of fiddling? Can you explain? Because I really wanna play URF.
same as others have metioned, hextech repair tool, reserting router, redownloading and I have not gotten it to work this time. I also am not getting to play urf.
I had to replace the UserKernels before but it doesn't work this time
Same here, please leave a comment when fixed ty.
